name: Mage Tower Defense (Crickkin)
description:
This game was a challenge i made for myself to build something in 24 hours. It may have a few bugs but i hope you found it fun to play. This is defense game where waves of enemies will try to pass you and destroy the fortress, you need to destroy protecting the fortress and yourself.

Z/Space - Attack

Up/Down Arrows - Move

X button(Xbox control) - Attack

Axis - Move
